name: Ekphrasia Teaser
description:
CONTENT WARNING: Dissociation, hallucination, derealization, suicide mention.

Diane is sick to death of everything, especially herself. All she has is a narcissistic mother, a miserable job, and a dying dream to pull her through. But what if that dream paid her a visit... in a far more corporeal form than she'd ever thought possible?

This Twine experience is a playable teaser for my interactive novella Ekphrasia, which will be released episodically on the Tales platform.
